previewArticle.title: Real Salt Lake vs. Chivas USA | MLS Match Preview

recapArticle.title: Real Salt Lake 2, Chivas USA 0 | MLS Match Recap

timelineItems.desc: Real Salt Lake hosts Chivas USA in a crucial game to bolster their playoff hopes.
timelineItems.title: KICKOFF: Chivas USA vs. Real Salt Lake

timelineItems.desc: Nearly an own goal by Donny Toia (Chivas USA).
timelineItems.title: CLOSE CALL: Donny Toia nearly screws the ball into his own net

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.

timelineItems.name: Joe Tansey
timelineItems.text: How Borchers/Salcedo contain Cubo will be key tonight for #RSL. They can't afford another loss on the Chivas USA farewell tour. #RSLvCHV

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Akira Kaji (Chivas USA).
Kyle Beckerman (Real Salt Lake) wins a free kick on the left wing.

timelineItems.name: Nick
timelineItems.text: #RSL looking much more positive on the attack tonight

timelineItems.name: jtimberflake
timelineItems.text: Literally, my favorite view in life. #RSL

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Alvaro Saborio (Real Salt Lake) header from the center of the box is saved in the top center of the goal.
timelineItems.title: CHANCE: Alvaro Saborío heads a cross on goal

timelineItems.name: Mike Waldvogel
timelineItems.text: RSL vs. Chivas USA. LAST regular season game! #playoffsbound #rsl #theriot

timelineItems.name: Chris Carter
timelineItems.text: Homies 4 life! #rsl

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: So, what did #rsl get Chivas USA for a retirement gift? The whole LD retirement sure raised the stakes to Target level. #RSLvCHV

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Alvaro Saborio (Real Salt Lake) header from the centre of the box is saved in the top centre of the goal. Assisted by Joao Plata with a cross.

timelineItems.name: Amanda
timelineItems.text:
Real soccer game tonight!
#realsaltlake #RSL #saltlakecity #utah #chicavsrealsaltlake #fun

timelineItems.name: OptaJack
timelineItems.text: 218 - @cdchivasusa have not conceded a goal in 218 consecutive @MLS minutes against RSL. Flipped. #RSLvCHV

timelineItems.name: Preston Olson
timelineItems.text: #RSL #riotinto

timelineItems.name: a.whitty
timelineItems.text: Field passes with the boys at the last RSL home game #RSL

timelineItems.name: Tyler Gray
timelineItems.text: Erick "Cubo" Torres just somersaulted over the sprinklers on his way to the locker room. Safe to say Chivas is loose. #RSLvCHV

timelineItems.name: Gale Force Winds
timelineItems.text: First row for the last regular game!!!!! #RSL #soccer #socrunck #smalllakecity

timelineItems.name: CMB
timelineItems.text: One final road game; glad it's in such a gorgeous place #RSLvCHV #RioTinto http://t.co/wOnmx9oPbX

timelineItems.name: Alicia Rodriguez
timelineItems.text: Chivas USA's second-to-last game (ever?) has been tape-delayed on local TV.

timelineItems.name: Kevin Hansen
timelineItems.text: Tifo of the year. #rslfamily  #rslvchv

timelineItems.name: Heath Waddingham
timelineItems.text: Perhaps a slightly sparse crowd tonight, being midweek. Or as Chivas calls it, "Packed to the rafters." #RSLvCHV

timelineItems.name: Heath Waddingham
timelineItems.text: Sabo with a header from 7 yards, saved by Kennedy. Good header, but with in the keeper's reach. #RSLvCHV

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Erick Torres (Chivas USA) right footed shot from the right side of the box misses to the left.

timelineItems.name: Kelly Weiler
timelineItems.text: I'm only watching in case Borcher's beard becomes sentient. #RSLvCHV

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Real Salt Lake. Conceded by Donny Toia.

timelineItems.name: lucaswmuller
timelineItems.text: Hello the pitch. @realsaltlake #rsl #sltid #slc

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Real Salt Lake. Chris Wingert tries a through ball, but Joao Plata is caught offside.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Luke Mulholland (Real Salt Lake) header from the right side of the six yard box is close, but misses to the right.
timelineItems.title: MISS: Luke Mulholland can’t get his close-range header on target

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Chivas USA. Nigel Reo-Coker tries a through ball, but Félix Borja is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Sean Walker
timelineItems.text: Chivas USA's all-blue kits with red stripes are sharp. Wouldn't be a bad direction to go for the re-brand. #RSLvCHV

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Luke Mulholland (Real Salt Lake) header from the right side of the six yard box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Joao Plata with a cross.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: The final match of the regular season at the RioT is underway and on MLS Live right now! #RSLvCHV

timelineItems.name: Heath Waddingham
timelineItems.text: 20' Mulholland NEARLY gets on the end of a header at the back post, but the shot goes wide.#RSLvCHV

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Kyle Beckerman (Real Salt Lake) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Ned Grabavoy.
Match ends, Real Salt Lake 2, Chivas USA 0.

timelineItems.name: Heath Waddingham
timelineItems.text: And there's the final whistle! #RSL's 2-0 victory forces FCD to win at home against Portland on Saturday to keep the 3rd spot. #RSLvCHV

timelineItems.desc: Real Salt Lake hosts Chivas USA in a crucial game to bolster their playoff standing.
timelineItems.title: HIGHLIGHTS: Chivas USA v Real Salt Lake | October 22, 2014

timelineItems.comment: Lineups are announced and players are warming up.
Foul by Alvaro Saborio (Real Salt Lake).
Eriq Zavaleta (Chivas USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Félix Borja (Chivas USA) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Kyle Beckerman (Real Salt Lake).

timelineItems.name: Tyler Gray
timelineItems.text: Beckerman tries his customary long range shot but its smothered by Kennedy. #RSLvCHV

timelineItems.name: David Flores ATC
timelineItems.text: Thanks, @nickrimando! Get em! #RSL #SLC

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: The Mulholland and Plata just-misses have looked better than some goals. #RSLvCHV

timelineItems.name: Sean Walker
timelineItems.text: 22' Chippy. That's the word our friends across the pond would use to describe the first 20 of #RSLvCHV. 5 fouls officially, more coming.

timelineItems.name: Denz
timelineItems.text: Well Dan Kennedy has had to do more in 20 minutes than the entire last match against #RSL but still 0-0 #Believe

timelineItems.name: Tyler Gray
timelineItems.text: Chivas certainly knows how to take the air out of the ball. Good practice for #RSL though. They need to learn to break this down. #RSLvCHV

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Chivas USA. Conceded by Carlos Salcedo.

timelineItems.name: Matt Montgomery
timelineItems.text: Positive signs so far … That we haven’t scored is surprising. Let the record reflect that I feel okay about this 23 minutes in.

timelineItems.name: Jefferson Curtis
timelineItems.text: The crowd is certainly not happy with the no call in the Chivas' box. #RSL #MLS #RSLvCHV #1320KFAN

content.caption: Not much of the ball for Chivas USA right now

timelineItems.comment: Ned Grabavoy (Real Salt Lake) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Akira Kaji (Chivas USA).

timelineItems.name: Tyler Gray
timelineItems.text: Another close chance for Plata after some clever passing, but Kennedy reacts quicker. #RSLvCHV

timelineItems.comment: Delay in match Marvin Chávez (Chivas USA) because of an injury.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Corner,  Real Salt Lake. Conceded by Erick Torres.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Javier Morales (Real Salt Lake) right footed shot from the left side of the box misses to the right.
timelineItems.title: CHANCE: Javier Morales brings the ball down and sends it just off target

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Real Salt Lake. Conceded by Erick Torres.

timelineItems.name: Heath Waddingham
timelineItems.text: 28' Javi's corner bounces in the box but no one can get a foot on it. Chivas clears. #RSLvCHV

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Javier Morales (Real Salt Lake) right footed shot from the left side of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Tony Beltran.

timelineItems.name: Shea Sterner
timelineItems.text: #RSL

timelineItems.name: Jason
timelineItems.text: Speak to me, warriors! #RSL

timelineItems.comment: Javier Morales (Real Salt Lake) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Nigel Reo-Coker (Chivas USA).

timelineItems.name: Tyler Gray
timelineItems.text: If it ain't broke, don't fix it. Chivas tucked in nice and cozy on defense. It's how they beat #RSL the past two times. #RSLvCHV

timelineItems.desc: Donny Toia (Chivas USA) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Donny Toia gets a yellow card for a late challenge

timelineItems.name: Salt Roads
timelineItems.text: Let's go #RSL beat Chivas! #RSLTID #MLS #SLC

timelineItems.name: Aowabin
timelineItems.text: Excellent take from Morales there, would've been a stunner if he scored. Still 0-0. #RSLvCHV #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Donny Toia (Chivas USA).
Luke Mulholland (Real Salt Lake) wins a free kick on the right wing.

timelineItems.name: Tyler Gray
timelineItems.text: That goal was easily GOTY had it gone in. Morales takes cross out of the air and juggles a few times before lacing a shot just wide #RSLvCHV

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Kyle Beckerman (Real Salt Lake) header from the centre of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Javier Morales with a cross following a set piece situation.

timelineItems.name: Matt Montgomery
timelineItems.text: Amazing from Javi, but also a great deep cross from Tony Beltran. Love it.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: SAVE: Dan Kennedy keeps #RSLvCHV scoreless by parrying away the Saborío header. http://t.co/6h8kFnqmvz

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Chivas USA. Conceded by Carlos Salcedo.

timelineItems.name: Justin Fernández
timelineItems.text: It's good to be back #RioT #RSL

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Bobby Burling (Chivas USA).
Nat Borchers (Real Salt Lake) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Joao Plata (Real Salt Lake) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Akira Kaji (Chivas USA).

timelineItems.desc: Penalty conceded by Bobby Burling (Chivas USA) after a foul in the penalty area.
timelineItems.title: PENALTY KICK: Bobby Burling called for a foul in the box

timelineItems.name: William Alvarenga
timelineItems.text: Watching the RSL vs Chivas USA game for my birthday!! Come on boys, we need the win!!! #believe #rsl

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  Real Salt Lake 1, Chivas USA 0. Alvaro Saborio (Real Salt Lake) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the bottom left corner.
timelineItems.title: PK GOAL: Alvaro Saborio tucks away the penalty in the bottom left corner

timelineItems.comment: Penalty conceded by Bobby Burling (Chivas USA) after a foul in the penalty area.
Penalty Real Salt Lake. Alvaro Saborio draws a foul in the penalty area.

timelineItems.name: Tyler Gray
timelineItems.text: Sabo draws the call, Sabo gets the penalty, let's see if he can put this one away. #RSLvCHV

timelineItems.name: Joe Tansey
timelineItems.text: It was only a matter of time before Chivas conceded a penalty, but that was a soft call. #RSLvCHV

timelineItems.name: MLSApologist
timelineItems.text: Dan Kennedy not really protesting the call. Feel bad for the guy. Hope he ends up in a better situation. #RSLvCHV

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Bobby Burling (Chivas USA).
Joao Plata (Real Salt Lake) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Alicia Rodriguez
timelineItems.text: Kennedy pushed most of his irate teammates aside on that PK call. This is probably it for Chivas USA's prospects in this one.

timelineItems.name: Heath Waddingham
timelineItems.text: It's nice that the scoreline finally reflects the utter dominance #RSL has displayed this half. #RSLvCHV

timelineItems.name: Matt Montgomery
timelineItems.text: Dive? Who cares right now. When was the last time we led Chivas? This is fantastic.

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Real Salt Lake. Luke Mulholland tries a through ball, but Javier Morales is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Emily West
timelineItems.text: Goal! #RSL

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Joao Plata (Real Salt Lake) with an attempt from the center of the box is close, but misses the top left corner.
timelineItems.title: MISS: Joao Plata can’t steer a cross in from close range

timelineItems.name: sleepyxpanda
timelineItems.text: Grandma ready to party for the #RSL match. #RSLvsChivas

timelineItems.name: madideas
timelineItems.text: Gooooooaaaaallllll #rsl @leothelion_00 @realsaltlake

timelineItems.name: Douglass Healey
timelineItems.text: #Saborio scored a goal! #RSL #realsaltlake #sltid #SLC @realsaltlake

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Erick Torres (Chivas USA) header from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Akira Kaji with a cross.
Attempt missed. Kyle Beckerman (Real Salt Lake) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the right.

timelineItems.name: Tyler Gray
timelineItems.text: Does Sabo have 2 more in him to continue his streak of at least 10 a season? Stay tuned. #RSLvCHV

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Real Salt Lake. Conceded by Eriq Zavaleta.

timelineItems.name: Erin B
timelineItems.text: #LeotheLion at the #realsaltlake game. #rsl

timelineItems.name: Andrew Pace
timelineItems.text: Best sign of the night so far: piñata (chivas) with a speech bubble "I don't exist" #RSLvCHV #RIPchivas

timelineItems.name: Chris Kamrani
timelineItems.text: Halftime: #RSL 1, Chivas 0. Saborio's 36th-minute penalty the difference as RSL is 45 minutes away from recapturing third place out West.

timelineItems.comment: First Half ends, Real Salt Lake 1, Chivas USA 0.

timelineItems.name: Jordan Lewis Wiser
timelineItems.text: Not a bad way to spend a Wednesday evening! #werewinning #rsl #goutes #imeanrsl?

content.caption: RSL is getting both the possession and the shots

timelineItems.name: Pyper Nicholes
timelineItems.text: Last game of the season. Great atmosphere, great temperature! #rsltid #rsl

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: #RSL has a 1-0 lead at the half. But this Javier Morales miss might be the play of the game. http://t.co/uhi09lFNen #HappyFeet #RSLvCHV

timelineItems.name: jarzymaing
timelineItems.text: We're here for RSL! #rsl #mls

timelineItems.name: J.D. Schoen
timelineItems.text:
Goooooaaaaaaallllll!
Great seats at the RSL Salt Lake game tonight! #datenight @laurenelizabethschoen #rsl

timelineItems.name: Blake Killpack
timelineItems.text: What a beautiful way to spend this evening! #RSL

timelineItems.name: Chris Kamrani
timelineItems.text: Ran into Garth Lagerwey in the hallway. He said Chris Schuler has been medically cleared to play when the playoffs begin. #RSL

timelineItems.comment: Second Half begins Real Salt Lake 1, Chivas USA 0.

timelineItems.name: buckmcmurray
timelineItems.text: Big shoutout to big @tacutler for the sweeeeet #rsl tickets!

timelineItems.comment: Javier Morales (Real Salt Lake) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Jhon Kennedy Hurtado (Chivas USA).

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: #RSL is 45 minutes away from a tentative hold on third place in the Western Conference. Time to tune in on MLS Live now. #RSLvCHV

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Real Salt Lake. Conceded by Akira Kaji.
Erick Torres (Chivas USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Alvaro Saborio (Real Salt Lake).

timelineItems.name: Brandon Fleming
timelineItems.text: Last match of the regular season. #RSL

timelineItems.name: Jordan White
timelineItems.text: Real Salt Lake game tonight!! It's been a good birthday!  #rsl #birthday #ilovesoccer

timelineItems.desc: Bobby Burling (Chivas USA) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.

timelineItems.name: chivasusa
timelineItems.text: Let's go #ChivasUSA! | Vamos #ChivasUSA! #RSLvCHV

timelineItems.text: My favorite view. Javi in front of goal. #RSL http://t.co/LNiyvtHyBy

timelineItems.name: Josette
timelineItems.text: Gotta love me some footy. Let's grab 3-points, boys! #BELIEVE #RSL #RSLvCHV

timelineItems.name: Justin Smith
timelineItems.text: Perfect way to spend a birthday! Thanks @cleighsmit and @brianacer for the tickets. #RSL #RSLTID #SLC

timelineItems.text: #RSL toying with Chivas in the box, but just not able to finish. #RSLvCHV

timelineItems.name: Jefferson Curtis
timelineItems.text: #RSL is, without a doubt, the better team on the field tonight. They just can't finish #MLS #RSLvCHV #1320KFAN

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Joao Plata (Real Salt Lake) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Ned Grabavoy.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Dan Kennedy gets down to his right to keep out Joao Plata Cotera

timelineItems.name: Homer 4 RSL
timelineItems.text: Wow, how many times has Javi been fouled already in this match? #RSLvCHV

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Joao Plata (Real Salt Lake) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Ned Grabavoy.
Corner,  Real Salt Lake. Conceded by Dan Kennedy.

timelineItems.name: Nick
timelineItems.text: #RSL coming so close, so many times, just can't quite get that second goal

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Real Salt Lake. Conceded by Matthew Dunn.

timelineItems.name: Tyler Gray
timelineItems.text: Exquisite turn by Plata and an even better touch by Grabavoy to get him the ball at the top of the 18' Shot is saved however. #RSLvCHV

timelineItems.desc: Marvin Chavez (Chivas USA) is shown the red card for fighting.
timelineItems.title: RED CARD: Marvin Chavez sent off for kicking the ball at a referee

timelineItems.comment: Erick Torres (Chivas USA) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Carlos Salcedo (Real Salt Lake).
Hand ball by Akira Kaji (Chivas USA).

timelineItems.name: Heath Waddingham
timelineItems.text: Short corner interplay between Plata and Beckerman leads to a good chance, but Plata shoots high. #RSLvCHV

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Joao Plata (Real Salt Lake) right footed shot from the left side of the box is just a bit too high. Assisted by Kyle Beckerman.

timelineItems.name: Matt Montgomery
timelineItems.text: Everything is so much more exciting when you can’t see it. Dunny and Bill great on TV and the radio.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: In the House of Rimando, Dan Kennedy is having a pretty good night. #RSLvCHV

timelineItems.name: Heath Waddingham
timelineItems.text: And a red card to Chivas for playing a ball that was already out of bounds off the AR! #RSLvCHV

timelineItems.name: LJ Prenot
timelineItems.text: My Wednesday night is better than your Wednesday night. #RSL

timelineItems.name: Francisco R. Ruiz
timelineItems.text: You can't kick a ball at a ref in frustration and not expect a red card. #RSL

timelineItems.name: Shawn
timelineItems.text: Love going to the games!!@realsaltlake #rsl @mls

timelineItems.comment: Erick Torres (Chivas USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Carlos Salcedo (Real Salt Lake).

timelineItems.name: MLSApologist
timelineItems.text: I think the commentators are more upset about the red card than Chivas. #RSLvCHV

timelineItems.name: Tyrel Pierson
timelineItems.text: Love of the game! #real #RSL #onlylove #thebest

timelineItems.name: Alicia Rodriguez
timelineItems.text: Dumb, dumb by Marvin Chavez, for kicking the ball at the AR. His tenure with Chivas thus ends ignominiously.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Alvaro Saborio (Real Salt Lake) right footed shot from very close range is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Javier Morales with a cross.

timelineItems.text: Perhaps this @RealSaltLake fan can get #MLSGrandparents going. (h/t @instagram user sleepyxpanda) #RSLvCHV http://t.co/Fx1uMuW1At

timelineItems.comment: Hand ball by Chris Wingert (Real Salt Lake).

timelineItems.name: Dave Tucker
timelineItems.text: Last game of the regular season for our real salt lake, and first game for my sons!  #rsl #family #balance  Love you @roxoramma and stace!  You guys are the best

timelineItems.name: Nick
timelineItems.text: Sabo was totally onside on that disallowed goal #RSL

timelineItems.name: Jefferson Curtis
timelineItems.text: another offsides call. It was the right call, but it's frustrating #RSL #MLS #RSLvCHV #1320KFAN

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: Sorry I'm late! Has @OriginalWinger or anyone mentioned do it's been 364 days and 5 minutes since #rsl scored on @cdchivasusa? #rslvchv

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: This idea that Chivas has a terrible defense is lazy journalism. #mls coaches always make a point to praise WC for team defense #rslvchv

timelineItems.text: 73' Luis Gil is making his way to the center line, along with Chivas' Kristopher Tyrpak. #RSLvCHV

timelineItems.text: Get er done. #RSL #Real #801 #MLS @realsaltlake

timelineItems.text: THANK YOU KYLE BECKERMAN.

timelineItems.text: Goal for the Captain and #RSL adds some insurance in the second half. #RSLvCHV

timelineItems.name: Sean Walker
timelineItems.text: Plata now has 6 assists on the year, the 3rd-most for #RSL in 2014. Not bad for a goal-scorer. #RSLvCHV

timelineItems.text: Chivas USA players getting their fill of reckless challenges and yellow/red cards while they still can. #RSLvCHV

timelineItems.text: Chivas never really made this a contest, can't remember a Rimando save in this match. #RSLvCHV #MLS

timelineItems.name: Jeff Riches
timelineItems.text: Get er done! #RSL #MLS #playoffs #Real #igutah #801 #utgram @realsaltlake

timelineItems.name: Heath Waddingham
timelineItems.text: Worth remembering the score here could be 4-0 but for two goals ruled out by close offside calls. #RSLvCHV

timelineItems.name: Kathy Clark
timelineItems.text: So excited. View from our 2015 STH seats. #AsOne #RSL STH #BELIEVE #realsaltlake http://t.co/SmKc5BJCXR

timelineItems.name: Heath Waddingham
timelineItems.text: 82nd minute. Pretty calm. No anxiety in the crowd. #RSLvCHV

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Real Salt Lake. Conceded by Donny Toia.

timelineItems.name: Shawn
timelineItems.text: Goal! #5 #beckerman #riot #RSL @realsaltlake @mls

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Real Salt Lake. Conceded by Donny Toia.

timelineItems.desc: Ned Grabavoy (Real Salt Lake) is shown the yellow card for hand ball.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Ned Grabavoy cautioned for a hand ball

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Alvaro Saborio (Real Salt Lake) header from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Joao Plata with a cross.
Hand ball by Ned Grabavoy (Real Salt Lake).

timelineItems.name: Vincent Sumbry
timelineItems.text: I wonder which expansion team is gonna pick up Dan Kennedy #MLS #RSLvCHV

timelineItems.name: Heath Waddingham
timelineItems.text: 86th minute, and this match is reaching its natural and expected finish. #RSLvCHV

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Agustín Pelletieri (Chivas USA).
Luis Gil (Real Salt Lake) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Daniel Holt
timelineItems.text: That Beltran to Plata pass was so sick it would take a whole med school worth of doctors to cure! #RSLvCHV

timelineItems.comment: Javier Morales (Real Salt Lake) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Matthew Dunn (Chivas USA).

timelineItems.name: Alicia Rodriguez
timelineItems.text: (Insert joke about that giant Plata shirt being bigger than Plata himself)

timelineItems.name: Vince Jeevar
timelineItems.text: Barrera and Morales are in a battle tonight - who will have the most rolls by the end of the game? Sorry state of affairs. #rslvchv

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: WATCH: @KyleBeckerman adds insurance in the second half against @cdchivasusa. http://t.co/05ChCVgIfs #RSLvCHV

timelineItems.name: Sarah Lerner
timelineItems.text: Platita. #RSLvCHV http://t.co/MrM94Qyfp9

timelineItems.name: Nic George
timelineItems.text: Last game of the season...but we have the playoffs. #soccer #slc #rsl #fall #family w/ @fivetwo_view

timelineItems.name: Heath Waddingham
timelineItems.text: "NO MORE CHIVAS" chant in the south goal. #RSLvCHV #RSL

timelineItems.name: Joe Tansey
timelineItems.text: This weekend in the Western Conference will be fun. All 5 seeds to be decided. #RSL only team scoreboard watching. #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Second Half ends, Real Salt Lake 2, Chivas USA 0.
